website_summaries.verdict: Enough space to make this the perfect choice for weekend getaways.
pros: Multiple compartments make it easy to store and find all of your essential items
The AIRFLOW back panel keeps you cool and comfortable
cons: Some reported the top zipper gets stuck too easily

customer_reviews.title: Very spacious!
customer_reviews.text: Very spacious backpack with 6 pockets. Each pocket can be used ( a lot of backpacks have a bunch of small pockets that can’t be used) Small when nothing is in it but can fit all of my books for this semester! Has a nice organizer pocket for pens/pencils/calculator. Has a tablet and a laptop pocket. My favorite feature of this backpack is the cushion for your back. I am giving 4 stars instead of 5 because the zippers are a bit wonky. They don’t zip effortlessly and get a little stuck in certain spots. Other than that hiccup I would defiantly recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than Anticipated
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son for school. He needs to carry a 3” zippered binder, a lunchbox and a Chromebook in a slim case. Unfortunately, it did not all fit in this backpack. I would think most backpacks like this should be able to hold a 3” binder, but that was definitely the item that made this a no-go. Returned and replaced with a Jansport (his previous one lasted 6 years, we were just looking for something different...). A few other notes: I’ve had a High Sierra backpack (non-laptop style) for years and love it. Fabulous quality and comfortable to wear. The zippers on this one snagged more than expected, and the overall weight was heavier as well.
customer_reviews.author: Solar Powered

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my kids "bug out bag"
customer_reviews.text: I was so impressed with these backpacks when they came. The straps were padded and the back of the actual bag was padded. I wanted these for my kids SHTF bags and they are PERFECT! There are so many different compartments to keep things organized and the side pocket (even though it's a little tight) holds a nalgene 48oz water bottle. It has a nice padded handle on the top. I bought 5 different types of high sierra bags for my children and these far exceeded all of the others. I am planning on only buying this style of high sierra bag for my kids school bag too! I'm in love (as far as backpacks go 😉)
customer_reviews.author: Vana

customer_reviews.title: water bottle mesh torn within one month
customer_reviews.text: We've normally loved High Sierra back packs. My kids will use them for 2-3 school years before we have to replace them. This particular one lasted 4 weeks of use,, then the side pocket mesh tore out of it. For a $55 back pack, I expect it to last more than 1 month. It is past the return period, so I'm not sure what to do. Would like a replacement from the seller.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Best Value for the $$
customer_reviews.text: One of the best backpacks I've ever had...lots of strong pockets, the zippers are all covered by fabric, so makes it more difficult for someone to mess with your bag. There are 3 deep pockets, 1 small pocket almost hidden by the handle that's perfect for keys, credit/bus cards. Inside is very well padded, the colors are true to the picture. Great bag for carrying my work logs, lunch, and water bottles. The shoulder straps are wide and strong, they are also well padded. When I do need another bag, I'm ordering this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Del Gaizo

customer_reviews.title: manufactured at China
customer_reviews.text: when I was looking for a bag, I found the description "Manufactured in America" attractive and decided to order this bag. As soon as I got it, I Checked the tag and found that it is also from China !!!! I felt horrible !!! Bag looks good , and I haven't decided whether to keep it or return it and look for a US brand . It has lot of pockets, and zipper is sometimes hard to pull on as the inside is not stitched properly . It pops out and makes it hard to put the zipper.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed, paid 53.00 and it came with a stuck zipper. The material feels flimsy as well, returned.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn_R

customer_reviews.title: Cats will not leave this backpack alone.
customer_reviews.text: After finishing school this turned into my weekend travel bag and every cat that has ever been around it loves it. I have to fight with my friends cat (who is Satan's spawn) to get my back bag when its time for me to leave. Its a great bag, lots of pockets and its very comfortable to wear. Its also his favorite nap spot.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh91

customer_reviews.title: Good bag with stiff zippers
customer_reviews.text: Pros * Colour - feminine but not girly * Sturdy - it's High Sierra * Water resistant * Padded back * Laptop sleeve padded and protected from the bottom as well. Unlike Matein bag, which is not protected at the bottom. * Two mesh pockets for water bottle and umbrella Cons * Zippers are not smooth - they are too stiff * I was fooled into thinking that there are 4 zipper compartments. Laptop compartment has two different zippers - don't know why. Overall, its a good bag. I am biased towards this brand as my older bag lasted 5 years and still going strong. I would definitely buy it if the company redo their zippers.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy with 2 deep mesh bottle holders
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and surprisingly lightweight with lots of storage. The zipper covers can be flipped back for easier access. Zippers and pulls are made very well. Lots of compartments. I was looking for a bag where my water bottles would not fall out. This one fits the bill! 2 very deep side mesh pockets, one on either side. The only thing that is missing is a caribiner loop to attach a lunch bag, but the interior is roomy enough to fit the bag. Side straps pull the bag in tight to fit in a locker.
customer_reviews.author: Rayndrop

customer_reviews.title: Zippers are difficult
customer_reviews.text: Zippers difficult to zip. They be ok after you break them in but we don’t want to take a chance. Tons of pockets to keep you organized. Returning. My son loved his old High Sierra backpack and we are so disappointed we can’t find the same one anymore.
customer_reviews.author: gabe'n'alex

customer_reviews.title: Good for a lady's work backpack
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a sleek, not too bulky work backpack for a lady working in a professional office and in the field. This backpack is exactly that. They only thing I don't like about it is that the compartments are that well organized, you kind of just throw things in each compartment and then it all gets lost. I like organized things with little useful compartments, this backpack isn't exactly that. But i do like how it looks and seems like good quality so it works.
customer_reviews.author: notcool

customer_reviews.title: This backpack is awesome!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Nursing student here. This backpack somehow fits all of my books, binders, and my 15in mac AND its still comfortable to wear (my books are pretty heavy). On top of that, it also fits my 40oz hydroflask in the side pocket and there's still room for snacks and anything I drag around on a daily basis! I've had it for almost 2 months now; I can verify that its pretty tough as I'm one of those people who tends to swing her backpack around and probably doesn't treat it the best. Very practical, one of my best school purchases!
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Dachel

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Backpack!
customer_reviews.text: Very durable backpack! Extremely well made, high-quality fabric, easy to use zippers, great storage/pockets! My kids loooove these backpacks! From 2nd graders on up to 5th graders -- these backpacks have proven themselves to be the perfect size! They are easy to use and a favorite in our family! This is the third backpack in this style we have purchased over the past five years! Highly recommend! Excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: TwinMom

customer_reviews.title: Sizable Backpack
customer_reviews.text: This bag is very sturdy and extremely wide. Fits the ridiculously large binder and bulky/heavy laptop from school that my middle-schooler needs to take every day. Also fits in a large hardcover novel and cardigan. Straps look supportive. Drink bottle sections could be deeper from side of bag outwards. Zips a little sticky. Also, no small outer zippered pockets (there are a couple of small compartments in the front pocket). Good colour (light pink). Looks like it will last a long time. Very good value for about $30 (we got the cheapest colour!!).
customer_reviews.author: AnnInKC

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: If I could give it a zero I would :-( this is the second High Sierra bag I’ve purchased I thought I would be pleased even after reading all of the bad reviews but not even a month with the bag and the zipper broke! So disappointed now I’m out of a bag and out of $30 plus not buying again!
customer_reviews.author: Boston

customer_reviews.title: First New backpack in a decade
customer_reviews.text: I finally decided it was time to replace my nasty old North Face backpack that served me so well before mass media. Took a while to decide and got this one. I LOVE it. So well designed with perfect pockets. Especially the tiny top one. Great for those little items you don't want to hunt for (inhaler, glasses case, phone charger.) dedicated laptop pocket. Another for your tablet and padfolio. Small pocket up front for essentials. One more for food or whatever. My only worry is the straps seem thin and I wonder if constant heavy weight would be an issue. But so far I couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Marcadimus

customer_reviews.title: This is probably one of the best backpacks I've owned
customer_reviews.text: This is probably one of the best backpacks I've owned. The problem is that the quality of the zipper for the top small sunglasses/wallet/keys/whatever pocket is very poor quality. I only owned this less than 3 months and it has already literally ripped off the rest of the backpack, resulting in a pretty much large hole in it. Great backpack design and pockets, ruined by the poor quality of the zipper. Also, as a note, I am very gentle with the zipper because I read the previous reviews saying it was hard to unzip, so i've been gentle with it not to damage and it still happened.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Lieu

customer_reviews.title: This backpack is the best in the world.
customer_reviews.text: I love this backpack. I use it for college and it holds everything I ask of it. The straps have the perfect amount of padding to ensure that my shoulders stay comfortable while I'm toting twelve books, and they are adjustable so I can have it hit the perfect spot on my back. This backpack is durable, it has lasted me for two years now. The light pink color is perfection. I love this backpack!
customer_reviews.author: Makayla

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 6 months.
customer_reviews.text: Lasted 6 months. The threads holding the shoulder strap to the top of the bag started coming apart. I didn’t have to much weight maybe 15 pounds. I had the same bag Previously I got in 2009 that lasted 10 years. This felt a lot cheaper compared to the old bag. I would not recommend this bag. High Sierra really cut corners.
customer_reviews.author: Beefy22

customer_reviews.title: The zippers are tough
customer_reviews.text: The zippers are a bit of a battle. tought to move. The flap over the main pocket zippers is difficult. The main compartment. So many zipper ways in. What I like is that it carries nicely on the back. I usually use a day hiking back pack to carry all my junk around and while it's comfortable when fully loaded it doesn't carry well while partially loaded. This one carries nicely fully or partially loaded. There isn't as much room as I'm used to so fitting all my jazz into the main area is a tight fit. But that's ok.
customer_reviews.author: Kid

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny i spent on it. I will purchase another once this one gets raggedy.
customer_reviews.text: I love this backpack. It has so many pockets. Very durable and very sturdy. I take it to class with me and it holds my gym clothes, protein shakes, and all my supplements. I have a very large laptop and it holds that baby like its not even there. 17.9 inch HP. This backpack is better than any Nike or Jansport I've ever owned. Yes it holds a lot of stuff so if you overload it, it will be heavy as hell. Common sense right. Its not designed for a person with poor upper body strength. Hope this helps your decision.
customer_reviews.author: bambambig19

customer_reviews.title: The zippers are a pain......
customer_reviews.text: The book bag is well made, and it holds everything my son needs, however there is one major design flaw on this. The zipper on the biggest section is a pain to operate because of the material flap over it. The material flap makes it extremely hard to zip and unzip without having to fold the flap completely over, then you have to continually turn the flap over everytime you need to get something out. My son has resorted to just using the laptop are zipper to get large objects in and out. I honestly feel that if you fix the zipper and make it easier to access the backpack would be so much easier for kids to get into.
customer_reviews.author: jj52382

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Returned this item. The zippers do not function smoothly, and I didn't want to fight them until the fabric gave out, as described by other reviewers. The second zipper from the back was my most frequently used pocket, but the hardest to zip. The straps sit too wide and always fall off one shoulder. (I'm a medium framed, medium height female). The straps have a hard inner seam that dig into my uper arms. No other backpack I've owned has ever had any of these problems, and I was quite disappointed. I could not adjust the straps enough to remediate the discomfort.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack, has held up well
customer_reviews.text: This product has held up perfectly for 8 months now, being used by a middle school boy who isn’t the best at taking care of things. Despite its daily abuse by him, it still looks like new, and I expect it to be used for several years based on how well it has held up. I love all of the different compartments and zippers. It fits a large zippered pouch/binder required by his teacher. The mesh pockets on the sides are sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: jeepmom

customer_reviews.title: Dependable Backpack
customer_reviews.text: I've owned this backpack for over 6 months and it looks and zips like it is still new. I was traveling for a bit and really over packed this backpack as I used it as my primary suitcase. The zippers are well constructed and did not fail at any time nor did I ever get that feeling that they would fail. The laptop pocket is perfectly padded and even fits my HP 17". The biggest challenge that I have with this backpack is that it has great storage capabilities and I forget which pocket that I put things in. In short, I don't find things very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: robert smith

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Had it for about 4 months, use it daily for school and outside of school. Rips in a few spots under stress. Shoulder straps, few different spots along straps. Zipper pulls are fabric, a few have become frayed. Anything that makes the bag useless? No, nothing ripped completely apart yet. Not the most expensive bag out there, just expected better build quality for the brand and price Update (a week after i posted original review) something else ripped, zipper on top came off, had to put it back on and sew together to keep from falling off again
customer_reviews.author: ethan

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: I was given one as a gift and my boyfriend liked mine so much that I had To get him one too. There’s like a million pockets. Perfect for a carryon first a short trip. Good laptop space etc. I’ve had mine for at least 5 years and it’s been beat up pretty good and it’s still holding strong. it’s a great bag.
customer_reviews.author: Djuna

customer_reviews.title: It is well padded and comfortable to wear
customer_reviews.text: I bought this knapsack to carry my 17 inch laptop. The laptop fits, but just barely, and I have to fight with the zipper to get it to close. Once closed, you can see the corners of my laptop poking out the top of the fabric. It is well padded and comfortable to wear. The large amount and variety of pockets makes it easy to carry everything I need. There is also a smaller padded pocket for my tablet. The little hook inside the front pocket is convenient for attaching my keys and makes it easier to find them without digging through all the pockets. I imagine this would be a perfect knapsack if it were only an inch bigger.
customer_reviews.author: EC

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Okay so this backpack is nice and roomy, which I did like. But the way the big pocket has a zipper, then a fabric piece, and then another zipper, it's really hard to put things in the backpack and get things out. The quality of the backpack itself is nice, but the design is a little flawed.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Not a keeper for me
customer_reviews.text: Did not care for this backpack at all. The zippers kept getting caught and the laptop compartment had a very strange configuration at the top. I kept looking for the big compartment for school books but didn’t find. Not going to work for my new high schooler. Went with LL Bean instead.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah E

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: It's durable. I have it packed full of stuff and it gets slung around my house, truck and delivery truck daily. It's holding up very well so far. Capacity is nice. It's got extra zippers for the main compartment so you don't have to dig to get to the back pouches. Very organizable. Really dig this. It is heavy duty for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love all the pockets and compartments though
customer_reviews.text: The book bag is really narrow and I have hard time getting a lot into it. It's loosened up a bit with time, zippers sometimes get jammed. I love all the pockets and compartments though. Over all not a bad backpack 9 month later update: So I've gone threw nine months of school and the bag isn't holding up as much as I was hoping it would. There's a lot of fraying and seems popping! The bag overall is still useable but idk if it will hold up to another year of college. I took one star off my initial review
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great backpack! My daughter has to carry alot of books and binders etc and this backpack has the room she needs. She especially likes that she can put a water bottle in one of the side pockets. Great deal and great seller!
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: I Couldn't be Happier!
customer_reviews.text: I love this backpack. It has so many compartments and the three things I always look for (1) a laptop sleeve, (2) a cellphone pocket on the strap, and (3) water bottle pockets on both sides of the backpack. It's a good quality bag. I've had it for a well over a semester now and it isn't showing any signs of wear. Seeing as I sometimes carry 30+lbs in it, this is quite the feat. I look forward to purchasing my next backpack from High Sierra (but not for a while, because this one is seriously going to last me!).
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Don't be misled!
customer_reviews.text: My primary purpose in buying this was to carry a 17 inch laptop. A 17 inch can barely fit into the main compartment, but it cannot fit in the lightly padded laptop compartment designed for this purpose. It's a good backpack but just be aware that if you carry a 17 inch laptop in it, the laptop is going to have to occupy the space with your other stuff banging around into it.
customer_reviews.author: Comfort lover

customer_reviews.title: 17 inch didn't fit.
customer_reviews.text: Really liked the backpack when it showed up but my 17 inch laptop did not fit well. Plenty of room at the base of the backpack but it tapered to much in the top and all though I could close the zipper it was tight on the corners and I figured it would wear out to fast. I ended up returning the backpack. If you don't need to fit an actual 17 inch laptop it would be a great backpack.
customer_reviews.author: C. M. Olson

customer_reviews.title: and a bunch of other stuffs in my backpack and it held together super well. No loose stitching
customer_reviews.text: This backpack has served me well for the past few years! I tried to get it at costco but they only had the red color. I was so pleasantly surprised to find it on amazon! I had to lug around my laptop, lab coat, books, and a bunch of other stuffs in my backpack and it held together super well. No loose stitching. No rips. And it didn't hurt my back as much as other backpacks. It is also affordable to boot. What more do I have to say? #collegestudenttestament
customer_reviews.author: Linh N

customer_reviews.title: Totally Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: My son had this same High Sierra backpack from about six years ago & it was time for a replacement. He asked if we could find the same one & we were excited to see they still made it. The reality is there's a big drop in the quaity. No wonder its cheaper. Also, the product does NOT match the picture. every part (zippers, bottom & trim) showing black in the photo is actually blue on the backpack. Photo matches his original backpack, so that was a bit surprising and misleading that it didn't match what was shipped, especially since this purchase was from High Sierra themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Wessel

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again, only flaw is holding stationary.
customer_reviews.text: Great back pack (using it now for a few months for work). Lots of good compartments, and fits my 17" heavy laptop like a charm (my main reason for buying it). The suspension shoulder straps are a nice perk. Great breathable back padding This backpack is quality construction. The only thing keeping me from givng it 5 stars is that it could use a lot of improvement in the stationary organization department (ie holding pens/oencils, small paper pads, erasers, passport etc). Asthetically it's a good looking backpack (really like the grey/orange combo). I used 3M scotchguard to waterproof it, and now it's travel ready for a world tour.
customer_reviews.author: CalgaryBuyer

customer_reviews.title: feels cheap,looks cheap,flaps over zippers are aggravating
customer_reviews.text: When I saw how much this bookbag holds I couldn't wait to get it and start using for work....the utility aspect of it is great,large,lots of room for laptop,ipad,notebooks and other misc. But the bag looks and feels like it should be $10, also the flaps over the zippers get stuck nearly every time you unzip to pull out belongings. I returned it for a TSA Elite.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Saunders

customer_reviews.title: Great storage, sturdy construction
customer_reviews.text: So far my daughter is very pleased with this backpack. It holds a lot (unfortunately for her back!), but is also comfortable. Nice wide straps seem to be holding up well. Lots of different compartments make it easy for her to separate books, gym clothes, snack, etc. This is definitely a large-capacity backpack, as you can see from the comparison charts Amazon provides. She also ordered a bunch of iron-on patches and dangling decorations to jazz it up and make it individual. This was purchased as a multi-year backpack (she's in 8th and we plan to use it through high school if we can), and so far it looks like it is going to come through for us.
customer_reviews.author: jnfalvey

customer_reviews.title: My son favorite backpack!!
customer_reviews.text: This is our 2nd order. The first one we bought it for my son freshman year in highschool but the side pockets both rip I guess for continue usages for water bottle. I did not know until my son told me. No longer functional both side pockets. Now he is a sophomore in highschool. He bought it again before schools start.
customer_reviews.author: tiffany chao

customer_reviews.title: Zipper coming detached after three months!!
customer_reviews.text: We loved the backpack for its size look and compartments. However, after just under three months the main zipper started to detach and is becoming unsewn!! It is otherwise in perfect shape and this is a complete waste of an otherwise great backpack! I contacted seller to see if they will do anything to help. If they do I would propbably up the rating to four or five as it may just be a defective item.
customer_reviews.author: Young

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent backpack. It is the best I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent backpack. It is the best I've ever had. I love all of the compartments. And I use it all the time for when I take short trips. Before I bought this I read in customer reviews there that some people had problems with the zippers getting stuck, but I have never had this problem because I have always been patient and careful, and now after a year, I haven't had any problems. The zippers are fine and well situated, so I think the issue was people not being careful. In any event, the straps are also very comfortable because they are padded at the top.
customer_reviews.author: Ab

customer_reviews.title: Good backpack but not as durable
customer_reviews.text: Good backpack with lots of storage pockets. Material is good for different conditions. My son used for his middle school book bag but should strap was not strongly stitched to hold all his books and binder. Wish I could’ve see & touched it to judge its durability.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Erika Quinones

customer_reviews.title: This college student LOVES this backpack!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this backpack for three semesters of college thus far and it works like a champ! Zippers are solid, TONS of storage and different compartments to stay organized. The straps are extra wide and padded just enough to be apply to carry heavy textbooks without ripping up my arms. Added bonus, when that random rainstorm hits, your homework won't get soaked. I didn't let my backpack stay in the rain for more than 15 minutes to really test it out, but there wasn't a drop of water inside! The colors on the teal and pink one are exactly as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Renner

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with low quality
customer_reviews.text: I was really surprised by how quickly this bag fell apart. It literally came apart at the seams within a month of use. I'm pretty crafty so I was able to fix those holes but for every one I stitched closed, 2 more popped open. I'm a teacher so I use my bag every day for bringing materails to / from work. It seemed really sturdy but didn't even make it through November! Very disappointed considered how much I paid :-/
customer_reviews.author: Shelley

customer_reviews.title: Spacious and Fits my school work and my Shoes/Shorts for after school sports
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite backpacks for HS. I fit a pair of shoes and shirts in one of the pockets for XC/TRACK after school, a binder and a book, and it has cup holders. A super nice high quality backpack that literally fits all my needs. I can pack all my stuff for my after school sports. Just amazing. I will continue to use high sierra backpacks as I had 2 before this one for elementary and MS. These just are so spacious.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had a high Sierra backpack similar to this one for about 5 years until my dog decided to chew the zipper off. Overall, I’m happy with this one; it’s comfortable and has nice features. My only issue is the zippers seem to be a bit difficult to zip open and shut; it can require a little messing around to get it open. Will update as I continue to use it!
customer_reviews.author: Kate Haruch

customer_reviews.title: It Does Its Job
customer_reviews.text: I love the laptop section, and the other pockets ended up being much larger than expected. I've only used the bag for a couple months, but it's holding up well and does what I need it to. I got this bag because my last one put too much strain on my shoulders, even when there was hardly anything in the bag. The straps of this one are well-padded and super comfortable. It does get a bit warm on my back when walking across campus, and I hardly ever open the main zipper to the big compartment because it sticks a little (instead, I just pull everything out through the laptop zipper, and it's not really a problem for me).
customer_reviews.author: Tessa

customer_reviews.title: nice but it fell apart
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful backpack - lots of storage and spaces to put notebooks , etc . however the seams came apart less than a month after I bought it. i have had to repair all the zippers at least once . For the price I paid it should have been made way better than that .
customer_reviews.author: gka4154

customer_reviews.title: This bag is both pretty and functional
customer_reviews.text: This bag is both pretty and functional. It is very roomy inside, and has lots of pockets for storage. The largest pocket has a tight pocket for electronics, which my 15" laptop fits in comfortably. In the same pocket, I carry my two 2" binders. The middle and front pockets are a little slimmer, but still hold my class books comfortably. The very front pocket has lots of nooks and crannies, where I carry pencil lead, calculator, pens/pencils...etc. This bag exceeded my expectations and I have come to really like High Sierra products. They are somewhat costly, but are definitely worth the money spent.
customer_reviews.author: Raine

customer_reviews.title: Seams bust easily
customer_reviews.text: Was super excited about this backpack as one of the physicians at work came in with it, I commented on it, and she highly suggested it. Said she had had it for a few years and never had an issue; and she had it fully packed up. Got it last summer for my son has he was going into high school. Before school ended, I had noticed that some of the seams were separating. I was highly disappointed given the rave reviews of this and especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: SoccerMom82

customer_reviews.title: Good bag - zippers are not smooth, but still good nevertheless
customer_reviews.text: This bag is a little bigger than I expected, but it is relatively light. The zippers are a bit "sticky" -- not as smooth as I'd like (thus 4 stars), but they are large and look like they should last the lifetime of the bag. There are lots of compartments -- one huge one that should fit a 13" laptop and books; a medium size one that can fit several notebooks; a small one that can hold knick knacks; and an even smaller one to hold a wallet/phone/pens. Finally, there's a small zippered pocket on the very top to hold keys and the like. The shoulder straps are large, padded and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Price - NOT

customer_reviews.title: The Zippers SUCK.
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a solid backpack overall. Love the pocket space, the dual bottle holders, and the material seems strong and very water resistant. But right off the bat I noticed that the zippers sucked. Like REALLY sucked. They do not like the curves on each side of the backpack at all and are impossible to unzip or zip without using 2 hands and somewhat forcing it around.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: The side mesh is really feeble
customer_reviews.text: The bag looks great and my 6th grader loves it. It cal also haul a lot of stuff. However, the water bottle mesh on the side is really weak. One side got torn after 2 weeks of use. After some scolding my son was a bit more careful but the other side got damaged too. Without the water bottle slot, the bag is practically useless for us (we live in AZ)...
customer_reviews.author: S. Ozev

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: Very spacious which is what I needed for work, well made padded space for laptop plenty of pockets and straps and comfortable to wear.. I would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, well thought-out backpack.
customer_reviews.text: I love this backpack. One of the best purchases I've made in a while. This pack has flown all over the world as a carry-on with me and it still looks new/good. The material, zippers, straps are all quality made. The computer slot/storage is padded and large enough for my 13 inch MacBook with room left over. There are two external storage areas for a bottled water and small umbrella. This is an excellent backpack. If something happened to my current one, I'd replace immediately with this same model.
customer_reviews.author: Billy D. Baker

customer_reviews.title: personal opinion, a very good backpack,
customer_reviews.text: love this backpack,, plenty of room with several pockets, i think more as it has layers of pockets, large pocket for computer, with zipper along to top for quick access to main pocket, then in front of that a slightly smaller pocket , in front of that one again a slightly smaller pocket, and then you can see in picture the smallest pocket. great as a kind of executive backpack where you carry books, notebooks, computer, etc.. computer fits into its own padded sleeve on inside. one small pocket with zipper for pens pencils, etc.. no solid material zippered side pockets but webbed side pockets for something like a water bottle.
customer_reviews.author: whtmtnspirit

customer_reviews.title: Sufficient pockets
customer_reviews.text: I needed a backpack for 2nd yr of college that had more pockets than the one I bought 1st yr. I chose this one bc it seemed to have sufficient pocket. It did not disappoint. I am very satisfied with this product. It seems very durable. I am not easy on my stuff. And I packed it very full to move into college and it did the job. Very satisfied. Lots of pockets to keep me organized.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas E. Wood Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Good for multiple devices, the zipper fabric area quality could be better.
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack plenty of space have had up to 3 14 inch laptops in it and some. As well as tools. One thing I do not like about it is the quality of the top pocket it's already falling apart and things can slip through the side corners into the larger opening.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle P.

customer_reviews.title: Havent used it yet but looks very durable and was exactly what i was looking for space wise.
customer_reviews.text: I have not used it yet due to the fact it was purchased for my son for school. If i have any issues i will contact seller and write another review letting everyone know how well its holding up for a middle school student. I really hope it holds up the whole school year because if it does i was planning on using it when we have our summer trip next year after school ends to Norway. And that would be the real test with the hiking we will be doing!! But so far so good. Has tons of room. And seems perfect for what i need it for.
customer_reviews.author: Caylala lyon

customer_reviews.title: It can hold so much!
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is amazing! It’s so pretty, super cute, and has so many compartments. I bought it for college and it was a good buy. I will definitely not have a problem with not having enough space in my backpack for my laptop, my books, notepads, or anything else I can think of. Great design and comes with a lifetime warranty. Well worth the cost and I would definitely recommend this backpack to anyone who is looking for something stylish, but also handy.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Postins

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, not what I expected from previous experience with the brand
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with the quality. I have had 3 previous High Sierra backpacks; all were well-made and sturdy. My most recent one finally started to get some fraying around the zippers, so I wanted to replace it. This bag is cheaply made and the zippers are very sticky / hard to work. The straps are also quite flimsy. Not at all what I expected based on my previous experience with this brand.
customer_reviews.author: laikabear

customer_reviews.title: Second Time
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd time I've ordered this name backpack. I'm happier with this one than the last and I was pretty happy with the last one. this one has more room and more pockets.. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Juice

customer_reviews.title: No security strap/buckle over laptop sleeve
customer_reviews.text: No security strap over the laptop sleeve and sleeve not padded well. VERY easy for a laptop to fall out if it gets ripped or the zippers just aren't zipped when you pick it up. Ultimately, I'm keeping it for my son because it's room, but in my view it's not a well designed laptop bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: There are lots of cool compartments, but it's not very roomy inside
customer_reviews.text: There are lots of cool compartments, but it's not very roomy inside. Bought it for my daughter and her book list consisted of 6 text books for standard 3 level, 1 dozen copybooks, 3 hard covered notebooks and two pencil cases. She had to fit some of the notebooks into the smaller compartments to make it fit. I bought the High Sierra trolley last term before she had to go upstairs and this was a lot more spacious. Although giving 3 stars, I am loyal to this brand; still love High Sierra because it is a very durable backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Seepersad

customer_reviews.title: I had one that was a gift and it is working fine for the last 3 years
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband to use it as office bag. He carries his laptop, lunchbox, waterbottle everyday. I had one that was a gift and it is working fine for the last 3 years. No damage, no ripping off, though I have abused it a lot. So that satisfactory results from first backpack, made the work backpack selection easy for my husband. He knew what he wants. He really loves it. It is very comfortable on the shoulders. No complain. The quality is still the same. We both love our backpacks!
customer_reviews.author: Beetle

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to love this pack
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this pack. It has great capacity, decent quality, and a good price. But the flaps over the zippers are a terrible design. You have to push and pull on the main compartment's zipper. I even cut the zipper flap to try to make it work, but it didn't help. I started to dread having to use this pack. Today I bought an excellent quality Osprey pack to replace this one. This is a decent pack for a good price, but I recommend saving your money to buy a well-designed version.
customer_reviews.author: L. Silver

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for college student
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new backpack for college. I walk around campus with heavy books and my laptop. I needed good straps. This backpack provided that for me. I love the padding on the straps. There are several different compartments that hold all my folders and books. The laptop area is padded and provides good protection to my computer. Very sturdy and I believe this bag will last me a good long time.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Rider

customer_reviews.title: Fits Origin EON 17x Pro
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to fight my 17 inch Origin EON-17x Pro and it fits perfectly. Overall the backpack is super comfortable and I can't even tell when I have a lot of weight in it. Typically I carry around 2 laptops with me, 17inch, and 15 inch..... They both fit easily and they feel safe in their compartments. Dimensions of the EON 17x - and it fits with about a half an inch on the top. Hope this helps you decide if it can fit your laptop! -Height = 1.5 inches -Width 16.46 inches -depth 11.1 inches.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: As expected - unsure where the odor came from
customer_reviews.text: These (for the most part) are exactly as i expected. -1 star as they have a slight odor to them (not sure if it is where they were made, or where they sat. These are plenty roomy enough to use for a kids backpack for school or for a quick emergency bag (my intended purpose). It has adequate pockets for keeping items separate and good quality construction feeling in the straps overall. I especially like the mesh pocket sides which allow for carrying a water or other drink bottle (one each side) not taking up any inside the bag space.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is excellent. The straps and back are strong and padded for comfort. The colors are nice, lots of pockets for all my teenagers needs. I think this backpack will easily last a couple years. We have seen the exact same one for twice the price ($85) at a popular shopping mall retail store. I truly understand wholesale vs. retail and business markets/markups, but when a family is shopping for school supplies for multiple children the financial burden can seem overwhelming, so finding deals like this one really help relieve some of that stress. Again great product, appealing to my teenager, and I think it is built sturdy enough to last through her last three high school years.
customer_reviews.author: JWoods

customer_reviews.title: These back packs are superb!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter had a High Sierra backpack from freshman year up until last week. She’s in her senior year of high school and would always overpack it, the zipper gave in and it prompted us to buy another High Sierra backpack. We did this because of the longevity and durability of the brand. Her old one would’ve lasted if she’d have taken care of it. Lesson learned, hoping this one lasts her through college as well!
customer_reviews.author: Ashleyangel

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and capacity
customer_reviews.text: I've had this backpack for a long while now and it's holding up great. True to the description, it has a large capacity and many compartments to keep things separate (you don't want your lunch next to your laptop). It does have a padded laptop sleeve, and can hold my laptop, tablet, a college textbook, a few notebooks, plus miscellaneous things. My favorite feature is a small zippered pocket at the very top, perfect for holding your cell phone! Overall very pleased with this backpack
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Quality lacking
customer_reviews.text: This is the backpack I bought for my son for school. He is in 8th grade. After only 2 weeks of use the straps on the sides by the cup holders are unraveling and breaking away from the backpack. At this rate, I hope the backpack will last him a year. Very disappointed. Not the quality I expected from high sierra.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie D

customer_reviews.title: ZIPPERS ARE TERRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: The zippers on this backpack are forever getting stuck/jammed. I have to peel back the material surrounding the zipper and hold it back so they can move freely. Not at all ideal when you only have one hand available. I just learned that my return window on Amazon closed 6 days ago. I would definitely return this if I could. Ugh!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Kuehn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for school
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for high school or college. A lot of storage space
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine247365

customer_reviews.title: My 17-inch laptop fits (though very tightly) and the support around the back and shoulders makes it very comfortable. The only p
customer_reviews.text: This pack is very durable and holds up well to the elements. My 17-inch laptop fits (though very tightly) and the support around the back and shoulders makes it very comfortable. The only problem is the media zipper at the very top of the backpack. I found that the zipper could zip back slightly when equipping the backpack. One time, I was unaware of this and headed out to school in rainy weather with the media zipper slightly open. Lost a book and several pages of notes to water damage as a result. I fixed it with some duct tape, but that media zipper is still the only thing preventing a solid 5-star rating for this pack.
customer_reviews.author: David L.

customer_reviews.title: Great sack
customer_reviews.text: After using what I believe to be the world's smallest backpack for over 3 years, moving into this feels like a limousine. I can stuff all sorts of things in here from books to shirts to my computer and Tupperware for lunch. It's so large, I managed to lose a Tupperware for a week, actually, then, seemingly from nowhere, it appeared in one of the pockets. I hardly noticed the extra bulk, I suppose. Overall, great backpack, and even though I am now putting more things in it, my back and neck hurt less than with my previous backpack. If you need to lug around a lot of things, go for this backpack. It's practical, nondescript and moderately priced.
customer_reviews.author: doppz

customer_reviews.title: High quality bag, will last years
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for the exact backpack my brother had, since he had it for the past 4 years; alas, I couldn't find one. This one is it, but there are minor differences. There aren't pockets on the shoulder strap things, for pens and stuff. But that was really the biggest difference. I still think that this bag could be a little wider, from ~8" to maybe 10" or 12". The shoulder strap things are super comfortable, and I can easily carry 30 lbs in it without discomfort.
customer_reviews.author: Yusuf Ahmed

customer_reviews.title: Best backpack I've bought thus far!
customer_reviews.text: After my last backpack (an east sport) finally fell apart after years of use in school, work, hiking , etc, I replaced it with this High Sierra Swerve pack. I must say there is a pocket for everything!! It's very well made, durable, and water resistant up to be certain degree of down pour. The mini pocket on top is extremely handy as well for things like head phones and computer mice. What I really like is the all around padded laptop sleeve, which was the deal breaker for me. Amazon also has the best price for this bag based on what I've seen. Extremely recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this backpack for my 12yr old daughter and we're very pleased with the comfort and quality of this backpack. She used it for the entire school year, and since for traveling, sleepovers and that sort of things. Just recently the top zipper began to tear but nothing that can't be fixed. I include pictures of this backpack after 2 years of good use.
customer_reviews.author: Reardon_tapia

customer_reviews.title: These compartments are easy to use
customer_reviews.text: after my quest for a travel/college backpack, I have found that this one has a lot of storage and organization. These compartments are easy to use, allowing enough access to the material. Having used this brand before, I trust the fabric will hold up to daily wear and tear through many years to come. The zippers are sturdy, as the handle. The color is very true to photo.
customer_reviews.author: Aleen

customer_reviews.title: Horrible zippers
customer_reviews.text: I hate this backpack. I was so excited to get it and it's been such a disappointment. The zippers are TERRIBLE and it's such a struggle to zip/unzip it every time because they are not smooth and they're constantly impeded by the flap of fabric that goes over them. Wish I could return it.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Nice Backpack
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to give it 5 stars, but the plastic buckle broke after 8 months of use. Bought it for my 11 year old daughter for school. She is not rough with her stuff. May have been overloaded sometimes and instead of using both straps, she uses one. Of course that is the side that broke! However, I think the buckles should be made a little sturdier. Also, she did have some issues with the zipper as everyone else mentioned. Once you get the hang of it and get the extra flap out of the way, it works better. Overall it is a really nice backpack that comes in a variety of colors.
customer_reviews.author: animaluver

customer_reviews.title: Great Backpack
customer_reviews.text: I had my backpack stolen and needed a replacement at a reasonable price. I took a chance on this one and have not regretted the decision. I absolutely love it. I've had it for almost 3 years now and it still looks brand new. Excellent quality and super cute pattern. I get compliments on it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute and durable but small.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my high school freshman and it's not very big. Once we add or 15" chrome book, she doesn't have much room left to get all her school supplies in the bag. We expected the bag to be bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Felix

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size, lots of pockets
customer_reviews.text: The size is perfect. I can fit my laptop, 3 binders and all of my accessories easily. I am a teacher, and it has enough pockets to keep all of my supplies organized. The only reason I am rating a 4 instead of 5 is the zippers. They are very stiff, and I worry about how they will hold up to daily use. Edit: The zippers loosened up, and everything is working well. LOVE this bag.
customer_reviews.author: JamieSue

customer_reviews.title: Great Backpack!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a student and have a lot of books to carry so I was looking for a backpack that could fit a lot of stuff. This backpack fits the bill for sure. I have had it for a couple of years now and I still love it! It has been worth the money spent for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: best backpack for heavy loads!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this backpack after carefully shopping for the biggest bag I could find that could carry a heavy load. I am in college. I carry a 5 pound laptop all my plus and books for 5 classes. This backpack is the best one I have ever had. I havealready 2 other backpacks from other manufacturers and after carefully checking all reviews etc I went with high sierra. Really worth the price. It had so much room inside and so many pockets. I am truly happy with this product and will be getting one for my son next.
customer_reviews.author: K. Florival

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag! But I tend to lose stuff in it.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this backpack for a book bag, suitcase, carry on, even a purse. It's a good, sturdy bag that has a lot of room in the pockets. My only complaint, and this is probably my fault, but I tend to lose things if I don't put them in the main pocket or the very front pocket. The ones in the center go down further than it looks, and I have misplaced things a few times that were right there in the bag; I just didn't dig deep enough.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Wetzel

customer_reviews.title: ... for over a month now and this is a great book bag
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this as a commuter bag for over a month now and this is a great book bag. Plenty of organization and very sturdy material. I agree with the other reviews that the zippers do stick some but it’s really not an issue. Love the small pocket in between the 2 main compartments. It’s perfect for stashing my keys, phone and badge.
customer_reviews.author: MWine

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for camping or just school or work
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well made backpack. Perfect for camping or just school or work. It There are many compartments and holders for books, laptops, water bottles, etc. I bought one of these the start of my freshman year in college and lasted me until my second year in graduate school. It was handling a lot of heavy books and supplies through out those years. When I needed to buy another backpack I opted for this exact item. If you want a very durable and comfortable backpack-and don't want to constantly buy one- this is your option!
customer_reviews.author: Candelario Orozco

customer_reviews.title: Exchanged and I’m having the same problem still.
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is horrible don’t waste your money on this product. The zippers always gets stuck. I had my 1st backpack exchanged and the one I just got is doing the same exact thing. Now I have to buy another backpack and throw this crap away.
customer_reviews.author: linda

customer_reviews.title: Great Backpack
customer_reviews.text: I had the same style of backpack when I was in middle school that I used my freshman year of college (so it definitely holds up over time) and it worked perfectly. The suspension straps are good for carrying a bunch of textbooks and a laptop, but the straps on my old one started to fall apart so I ordered a new one and the newer one actually holds more than the old one. It has a lot of pockets and it can really fit a lot. It's the perfect backpack for me.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Johnson

customer_reviews.title: I love this backpack!
customer_reviews.text: I have always had a small, one zipper, Jansport backpack. Recently, as I started college, I realized how uncomfortable my Jansport backpack was. So, I looked up some backpacks on Amazon and stumbled upon this one. Basically, let's just say, I didn't know there was a such a thing as "backpack technology" until I purchased this backpack. Amazing back and should support!! My back no longer hurts carrying texts in my backpack. Lots of compartments for stuff you may need. 2 water bottle holders is a plus. Also, I must say my favorite compartment is the sneaky and small pocket zipper on top of the backpack; perfect for sunglasses, phone, wallet/ID--and it's EASILY accessible. Love this item, thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Shay Azar

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: This is a great back pack for a student with lots of books....or if you have a lot to carry. It personally was a little big for me, I use it for work, not school. But I can tell the quality is great. Lots of compartments
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overall great backpack except seam came apart...
customer_reviews.text: Overall great backpack except seam of zipper of main compartment came apart after about 2 months. Love the capacity, holds my laptop and small binder, and most importantly a change of clothes after the gym.
customer_reviews.author: S Y.

product_meta.title: High Sierra Swerve Laptop Backpack
product_meta.description: High Sierra designs feature-rich, versatile adventure lifestyle gear for adventurers everywhere. We've committed ourselves to creating durable, affordable product with distinctive details, delivering the freedom to go anywhere.
feature_bullets: LAPTOP and TABLET SLEEVE: features a fully-padded Cushion Zone laptop sleeve that fits most 17" laptops and a TechSpot sleeve for your tablet; dual access to the digital gear makes it ideal for a gamer laptop backpack

LARGE MAIN COMPARTMENT with ORGANIZER POCKET; a student laptop backpack with a large main compartment, an organizer compartment with multiple pockets and a key fob hook perfect for keeping all of your smaller items secure

DESIGNED FOR COMFORT, EASE OF CARRYING: this boys laptop backpack's padded shoulder straps and back panel provide comfort and ease when carrying gear; non-slip shoulder pads distribute weight more evenly; a swivel clip at the end helps prevent twisting

MEDIA POCKET with USB PORT: a zippered accessory pocket with USB port allows easy access to your media devices; so you can enjoy your favorite music or listen to your favorite audiobook anywhere you go
BEVERAGE POCKET: a mesh beverage pocket keeps your drink close at hand and helps you stay hydrated
